trans-unit.source: description="Customers can now easily discovery and deploy big data application alongside their HDInsight clusters right from within the provisioning portal."
trans-unit.target: description="Customers can now easily discovery and deploy big data application alongside their HDInsight clusters right from within the provisioning portal."

trans-unit.source: HDInsight Application Partners
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Application Partners

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/dataguise1.png) Dataguise delivers data privacy protection and risk assessment analytics that allow organizations to safely leverage and share enterprise data.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/dataguise1.png) Dataguise delivers data privacy protection and risk assessment analytics that allow organizations to safely leverage and share enterprise data.

trans-unit.source: Our solutions simplify governance as they proactively locate sensitive data, automatically protect it with appropriate remediation polices, and provide actionable compliance intelligence to decision makers, in real-time.
trans-unit.target: Our solutions simplify governance as they proactively locate sensitive data, automatically protect it with appropriate remediation polices, and provide actionable compliance intelligence to decision makers, in real-time.

trans-unit.source: In Hadoop deployments, our solutions inspect incoming data and protect it before it is stored.
trans-unit.target: In Hadoop deployments, our solutions inspect incoming data and protect it before it is stored.

trans-unit.source: These capabilities simplify risk management, improve operational efficiencies, and reduce regulatory compliance costs.
trans-unit.target: These capabilities simplify risk management, improve operational efficiencies, and reduce regulatory compliance costs.

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/datatorrent2.png) As a native Hadoop solution, DataTorrent enables you to leverage your existing Hadoop environment for real-time stream analytics on a massive scale.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/datatorrent2.png) As a native Hadoop solution, DataTorrent enables you to leverage your existing Hadoop environment for real-time stream analytics on a massive scale.

trans-unit.source: Processing billions of events per second with sub-second latency, DataTorrent supports today’s most demanding, mission-critical, big-data applications.
trans-unit.target: Processing billions of events per second with sub-second latency, DataTorrent supports today’s most demanding, mission-critical, big-data applications.

trans-unit.source: Common use cases include processing machine-data for the Internet of
trans-unit.target: Common use cases include processing machine-data for the Internet of

trans-unit.source: Things, fraud detection in financial services, log analysis and IT
trans-unit.target: Things, fraud detection in financial services, log analysis and IT

trans-unit.source: operations, Geo-location services, Social apps, and more.
trans-unit.target: operations, Geo-location services, Social apps, and more.

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/datameer3.png) Datameer’s end-to-end Big Data Discovery solution enables business users to discover insights in any data via wizard-based data integration, iterative point-and-click analytics, and drag-and-drop visualizations, regardless of the data type, size, or source.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/datameer3.png) Datameer’s end-to-end Big Data Discovery solution enables business users to discover insights in any data via wizard-based data integration, iterative point-and-click analytics, and drag-and-drop visualizations, regardless of the data type, size, or source.

trans-unit.source: Optimized for big data analytical workloads characterized by multiple
trans-unit.target: Optimized for big data analytical workloads characterized by multiple

trans-unit.source: data sources of varying types, Datameer uses Hortonworks Data Platform
trans-unit.target: data sources of varying types, Datameer uses Hortonworks Data Platform

trans-unit.source: for both storage and compute, and is a fully extensible solution that
trans-unit.target: for both storage and compute, and is a fully extensible solution that

trans-unit.source: can integrate with existing DW or BI solutions.
trans-unit.target: can integrate with existing DW or BI solutions.

trans-unit.source: Datameer users can also
trans-unit.target: Datameer users can also

trans-unit.source: gain instant insights via the Datameer App Market, which offers dozens
trans-unit.target: gain instant insights via the Datameer App Market, which offers dozens

trans-unit.source: of pre-built analytic applications across a variety of use cases and
trans-unit.target: of pre-built analytic applications across a variety of use cases and

trans-unit.source: data types.
trans-unit.target: data types.

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/concurrent4.png) Concurrent, Inc.’s vision is to become the \#1 software platform choice for Big Data applications.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/concurrent4.png) Concurrent, Inc.’s vision is to become the \#1 software platform choice for Big Data applications.

trans-unit.source: Concurrent builds application infrastructure products that are designed to help enterprises create, deploy, run and manage data processing applications at scale on Apache Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: Concurrent builds application infrastructure products that are designed to help enterprises create, deploy, run and manage data processing applications at scale on Apache Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: Concurrent is the mind behind Cascading™, the most widely used and deployed technology for Big Data applications with more than 75,000+ user downloads a month.
trans-unit.target: Concurrent is the mind behind Cascading™, the most widely used and deployed technology for Big Data applications with more than 75,000+ user downloads a month.

trans-unit.source: Used by thousands of data driven businesses including Twitter, eBay, The Climate Corp and Etsy, Cascading is the de-facto standard in open source application infrastructure technology.
trans-unit.target: Used by thousands of data driven businesses including Twitter, eBay, The Climate Corp and Etsy, Cascading is the de-facto standard in open source application infrastructure technology.

trans-unit.source: http://www.concurrentinc.com/
trans-unit.target: http://www.concurrentinc.com/

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/bluetalon5.png) Today’s businesses collect more and more data and need to explicitly define the scope of access that users should have to that data.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/bluetalon5.png) Today’s businesses collect more and more data and need to explicitly define the scope of access that users should have to that data.

trans-unit.source: Any disconnect between what data users have access to and what they actually need to do their job can leave companies exposed to unnecessary risks.
trans-unit.target: Any disconnect between what data users have access to and what they actually need to do their job can leave companies exposed to unnecessary risks.

trans-unit.source: As enterprises build big data environments, they must redefine how they control their data.
trans-unit.target: As enterprises build big data environments, they must redefine how they control their data.

trans-unit.source: BlueTalon delivers the best data control technology for today’s data challenge and keeps you in control of your data.
trans-unit.target: BlueTalon delivers the best data control technology for today’s data challenge and keeps you in control of your data.

trans-unit.source: http://bluetalon.com/
trans-unit.target: http://bluetalon.com/

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/redpoint6.png) For organizations eager to make Hadoop part of their data ecosystem, but struggling to find people with MapReduce skills, RedPoint has a solution.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/redpoint6.png) For organizations eager to make Hadoop part of their data ecosystem, but struggling to find people with MapReduce skills, RedPoint has a solution.

trans-unit.source: RedPoint’s top-rated data quality and data integration capabilities are now available for Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: RedPoint’s top-rated data quality and data integration capabilities are now available for Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: With RedPoint, the same data analysts and database administrators
trans-unit.target: With RedPoint, the same data analysts and database administrators

trans-unit.source: already working with traditional databases can now work just as easily
trans-unit.target: already working with traditional databases can now work just as easily

trans-unit.source: with data stored in Hadoop.
trans-unit.target: with data stored in Hadoop.

trans-unit.source: No new skills are required.
trans-unit.target: No new skills are required.

trans-unit.source: No MapReduce, no
trans-unit.target: No MapReduce, no

trans-unit.source: Hive, no Pig – thanks to RedPoint’s graphical user interface and pure
trans-unit.target: Hive, no Pig – thanks to RedPoint’s graphical user interface and pure

trans-unit.source: YARN architecture (certified on Hadoop 2.0 by Hortonworks).
trans-unit.target: YARN architecture (certified on Hadoop 2.0 by Hortonworks).

trans-unit.source: With RedPoint:
trans-unit.target: With RedPoint:

trans-unit.source: All data quality and data integration functions can be performed in the Hadoop cluster – ELT, cleanse, match, de-dupe, merge/purge, householding, parsing, partitioning, appending, address standardization, key creation and maintenance, automation, monitoring, notification
trans-unit.target: All data quality and data integration functions can be performed in the Hadoop cluster – ELT, cleanse, match, de-dupe, merge/purge, householding, parsing, partitioning, appending, address standardization, key creation and maintenance, automation, monitoring, notification

trans-unit.source: No MapReduce is involved, and no MapReduce skills are needed
trans-unit.target: No MapReduce is involved, and no MapReduce skills are needed

trans-unit.source: Data quality and integration processes execute as efficiently – and in many cases more efficiently – with RedPoint as with MapReduce-based solutions
trans-unit.target: Data quality and integration processes execute as efficiently – and in many cases more efficiently – with RedPoint as with MapReduce-based solutions

trans-unit.source: Data doesn’t need to be moved out of Hadoop for processing, analytics, reporting or other action
trans-unit.target: Data doesn’t need to be moved out of Hadoop for processing, analytics, reporting or other action

trans-unit.source: No software needs to be installed in the cluster itself, and RedPoint respects YARN’s task prioritization rather than competing for computing resources in the cluster
trans-unit.target: No software needs to be installed in the cluster itself, and RedPoint respects YARN’s task prioritization rather than competing for computing resources in the cluster

trans-unit.source: Users can manage data in both traditional and Hadoop repositories with a single product, even bringing together data from separate environments or migrate data from one to the other
trans-unit.target: Users can manage data in both traditional and Hadoop repositories with a single product, even bringing together data from separate environments or migrate data from one to the other

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the resources on the right-hand side of this
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the resources on the right-hand side of this

trans-unit.source: page.
trans-unit.target: page.

trans-unit.source: RedPoint has been rated \#1 in user surveys for speed, match quality and ease of use, and generally for customer and third party data management.
trans-unit.target: RedPoint has been rated \#1 in user surveys for speed, match quality and ease of use, and generally for customer and third party data management.

trans-unit.source: [Contact us](http://www.redpoint.net/Products/BigData.aspx) to see how RedPoint can make managing data quality and data integration in your Hadoop environment easier, faster, lower-cost and more effective.
trans-unit.target: [Contact us](http://www.redpoint.net/Products/BigData.aspx) to see how RedPoint can make managing data quality and data integration in your Hadoop environment easier, faster, lower-cost and more effective.

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/cask7.png) Cask is an open source big data software company focused on developers.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/cask7.png) Cask is an open source big data software company focused on developers.

trans-unit.source: The Cask Data Application Platform (CDAP), our flagship product, makes it easy for any Java developer to build, debug, test, scale, and manage Apache Hadoop applications and then deploy them instantly to a Hortonworks Data Platform Hadoop cluster.
trans-unit.target: The Cask Data Application Platform (CDAP), our flagship product, makes it easy for any Java developer to build, debug, test, scale, and manage Apache Hadoop applications and then deploy them instantly to a Hortonworks Data Platform Hadoop cluster.

trans-unit.source: CDAP includes both a development framework and runtime services that cover the entire lifecycle of building and running big data applications – both on-premise and in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: CDAP includes both a development framework and runtime services that cover the entire lifecycle of building and running big data applications – both on-premise and in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Based in Palo Alto, California, the company is backed by leading investors including Battery Ventures, Andreessen Horowitz, and Ignition Partners.
trans-unit.target: Based in Palo Alto, California, the company is backed by leading investors including Battery Ventures, Andreessen Horowitz, and Ignition Partners.

trans-unit.source: The team has built and operated some of the largest Big Data apps in the world.
trans-unit.target: The team has built and operated some of the largest Big Data apps in the world.

trans-unit.source: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/kyvos8.png) Kyvos is committed to unlock the power of Big Data Analytics with its unique “OLAP on Hadoop” technology.
trans-unit.target: ![](media/hdinsight-application-partners/kyvos8.png) Kyvos is committed to unlock the power of Big Data Analytics with its unique “OLAP on Hadoop” technology.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to build cubes in-place on Hadoop with linear scalability, eliminating the limitations of traditional OLAP solutions, and enabling interactive multi-dimensional analytics on your Big Data.
trans-unit.target: This allows you to build cubes in-place on Hadoop with linear scalability, eliminating the limitations of traditional OLAP solutions, and enabling interactive multi-dimensional analytics on your Big Data.

trans-unit.source: Users can visualize, explore and analyze their data interactively on Hadoop with no programming required.
trans-unit.target: Users can visualize, explore and analyze their data interactively on Hadoop with no programming required.
